metadata.title: CVE-2024-27074 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: go7007: fix a memleak in go7007_load_encoderIn go7007_load_encoder, bounce(i.e. go->boot_fw), is allocated withouta deallocation thereafter. After the following call chain:saa7134_go7007_init  |-> go7007_boot_encoder        |-> go7007_load_encoder  |-> kfree(go)go is freed and thus bounce is leaked.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
